mapper.select: SELECT regid,orgname,deptname,patientname,sexcode,regdate as seedate,paykindname FROM j_opr_register WHERE regstatus = '0' ORDER BY regdate desc LIMIT 100

SELECT unit_id as unitId,SUM(case when serial_number = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m%d' )then total_num else 0 end) as count FROM `data_processed_day` WHERE event_id = '13001' and unit_id!='320583810343' GROUP BY unit_id

SELECT unit_id as unitId,SUM(case when serial_number = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m%d' )then total_num else 0 end) as count FROM `data_processed_day` WHERE event_id = '13002' and unit_id!='320583810343' GROUP BY unit_id

SELECT unit_id as unitId,SUM(case when left(serial_number,6) = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m' )then total_num else 0 end) as count FROM `data_processed_day` WHERE event_id = '13001' and unit_id!='320583810343' GROUP BY unit_id

SELECT unit_id as unitId,SUM(case when left(serial_number,6) = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m' )then total_num else 0 end) as count FROM `data_processed_day` WHERE event_id = '13002' and unit_id!='320583810343' GROUP BY unit_id

SELECT unit_id as unitId,SUM(case when serial_number = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m%d' )then total_num else 0 end) as count FROM `data_processed_day` WHERE event_id = '31008' and unit_id!='320583810343' GROUP BY unit_id

SELECT unit_id as unitId,SUM(case when serial_number = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m%d' )then total_num else 0 end) as count FROM `data_processed_day` WHERE event_id = '31007' and unit_id!='320583810343' GROUP BY unit_id

SELECT unit_id as unitId,SUM(case when left(serial_number,6) = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m' )then total_num else 0 end) as count FROM `data_processed_day` WHERE event_id = '31008' and unit_id!='320583810343' GROUP BY unit_id

SELECT unit_id as unitId,SUM(case when left(serial_number,6) = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m' )then total_num else 0 end) as count FROM `data_processed_day` WHERE event_id = '31007' and unit_id!='320583810343' GROUP BY unit_id
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( serial_number,'%Y-%m') as month,SUM(total_num) as count from data_processed_day where event_id in ('21000','21001') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( serial_number,'%Y-%m');

SELECT createdunitname AS signOrg,selfname as signName, gender as signGender, signperiodtofrom as signDate,teamname as signTeam,familynew as signType from g_fha_person_sign_main where STATUS =1 and stateid =0 and LASTFLAG = '1' order by createdtime desc limit 30;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( serial_number,'%Y-%m') as month,SUM(total_num) as count from data_processed_day where event_id='13003' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( serial_number,'%Y-%m');
select DATE_FORMAT(managedate,'%Y-%m') as month ,count(1) as count from g_fha_person_main where stateid='1' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( managedate,'%Y-%m');
select count(1) from g_fha_person_main where stateid='1' and managedate < #{month} ;
select data from data_view_store where id=#{id};

select t.MANAGEDCENTERCODE,t.PRESSUREMANAGENUMBER,m.PRESSUREFOLLOWNUMBER from (select porgcode as MANAGEDCENTERCODE ,COALESCE (SUM(gf) ,0) as PRESSUREMANAGENUMBER from report_year_blood where yeartype=1 and reportyear = #{year} group by porgcode) t
left join (select porgcode as MANAGEDCENTERCODE ,COALESCE (SUM(sf) ,0) as PRESSUREFOLLOWNUMBER from report_year_blood where yeartype=1 and reportyear = #{year} group by porgcode) m on t.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = m.MANAGEDCENTERCODE

select t.MANAGEDCENTERCODE,t.SUGARMANAGENUMBER,m.SUGARFOLLOWNUMBER from (select porgcode as MANAGEDCENTERCODE ,COALESCE (SUM(gf) ,0) as SUGARMANAGENUMBER from report_year_diabetes where yeartype=1 and reportyear = #{year} group by porgcode) t
left join (select porgcode as MANAGEDCENTERCODE ,COALESCE (SUM(sf) ,0) as SUGARFOLLOWNUMBER from report_year_diabetes where yeartype=1 and reportyear = #{year} group by porgcode) m on t.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = m.MANAGEDCENTERCODE
